Minor Health Potion.name: Minor Health Potion
Minor Health Potion.description: A small vial containing a red liquid that restores 50 HP. Essential for adventurers on the go.
Minor Health Potion.flavor: The basic healing potion that every adventurer starts with. Simple, reliable, and life-saving.

Health Potion.name: Health Potion
Health Potion.description: A standard red potion that restores 100 HP. The reliable choice for most adventurers.
Health Potion.flavor: The gold standard of healing potions. Not too weak, not too expensive.

Greater Health Potion.name: Greater Health Potion
Greater Health Potion.description: A large vial of potent red liquid that restores 250 HP. For serious battles.
Greater Health Potion.flavor: When you need to get back in the fight quickly. This potion packs a serious punch.

Mana Potion.name: Mana Potion
Mana Potion.description: A blue vial that restores 50 Mana. Keeps the magic flowing.
Mana Potion.flavor: The magical equivalent of a health potion. Essential for spellcasters.

Elixir of Power.name: Elixir of Power
Elixir of Power.description: A shimmering golden elixir that temporarily boosts all stats by +5 for 3 turns.
Elixir of Power.flavor: The ultimate combat enhancer. When you need to turn the tide of battle.

Rusty Sword.name: Rusty Sword
Rusty Sword.description: An old, weathered sword that's still sharp enough to be useful. +2 STR
Rusty Sword.flavor: Every great hero started with a rusty sword. This one's seen better days, but it'll get the job done.

Iron Broadsword.name: Iron Broadsword
Iron Broadsword.flavor: The workhorse of the adventuring world. Reliable, sturdy, and gets the job done.

Steel Claymore.name: Steel Claymore
Steel Claymore.description: A massive blade that requires great strength to wield. +10 STR, -2 Speed
Steel Claymore.flavor: For those who believe that bigger is better. This sword demands respect and strength.

Rune Blade.name: Rune Blade
Rune Blade.description: A sword etched with magical runes that enhance both physical and magical power. +5 STR, +10 INT
Rune Blade.flavor: A perfect blend of martial prowess and arcane might. The weapon of a true battle mage.

Dragon Slayer.name: Dragon Slayer
Dragon Slayer.description: A legendary sword forged in dragonfire. +20 STR, +5 VIT
Dragon Slayer.flavor: Said to have been used to slay the great dragon of the northern mountains. A weapon of legend.

Wooden Staff.name: Wooden Staff
Wooden Staff.description: A basic wooden staff that serves as a focus for magical energy. +2 INT
Wooden Staff.flavor: The first step on the path of magic. Simple wood, but it channels power effectively.

Apprentice Wand.name: Apprentice Wand
Apprentice Wand.description: A standard magical focus issued to magic academy students. +5 INT
Apprentice Wand.flavor: Every great wizard started as an apprentice. This wand has helped many begin their journey.

Crystal Staff.name: Crystal Staff
Crystal Staff.description: A staff topped with a clear crystal that amplifies magical power. +12 INT, -3 VIT
Crystal Staff.flavor: The crystal focuses magical energy with incredible precision, but drains the user's life force.

Void Scepter.name: Void Scepter
Void Scepter.description: A dark scepter that draws power from the void. +8 INT, +5 STR
Void Scepter.flavor: Power comes at a price. This scepter offers great magical strength but whispers of darkness.

Divine Staff.name: Divine Staff
Divine Staff.description: A staff that channels divine energy. +25 INT
Divine Staff.flavor: Blessed by the gods themselves. This staff radiates holy power and wisdom.

Iron Dagger.name: Iron Dagger
Iron Dagger.description: A small but deadly blade. +2 DEX
Iron Dagger.flavor: Small but deadly. Perfect for quick strikes and precise movements.

Poisoned Knife.name: Poisoned Knife
Poisoned Knife.description: A dagger coated in deadly venom. +4 DEX, +2 STR
Poisoned Knife.flavor: A assassin's favorite. The poison does the work while you stay at a safe distance.

Twin Blades.name: Twin Blades
Twin Blades.description: A pair of perfectly balanced daggers meant to be used together. +10 DEX
Twin Blades.flavor: Dance of death with two blades. Speed and precision are your greatest weapons.

Shadow Blade.name: Shadow Blade
Shadow Blade.description: A blade that seems to absorb light. +7 DEX, +5 LUCK
Shadow Blade.flavor: Hard to see, impossible to avoid. Lady luck favors those who strike from the shadows.

Assassin's Edge.name: Assassin's Edge
Assassin's Edge.description: A legendary blade known for its perfect balance. +18 DEX, +5 LUCK
Assassin's Edge.flavor: The weapon of legends. One strike, one kill. The assassin's ultimate tool.

Leather Tunic.name: Leather Tunic
Leather Tunic.description: Light leather armor that provides basic protection. +3 VIT
Leather Tunic.flavor: Comfortable and flexible. Perfect for adventurers who value mobility over heavy protection.

Chainmail Vest.name: Chainmail Vest
Chainmail Vest.description: Interlocking metal rings provide balanced protection. +6 VIT, -1 DEX
Chainmail Vest.flavor: The classic adventurer's armor. Good protection without sacrificing too much mobility.

Plate Armor.name: Plate Armor
Plate Armor.description: Heavy metal plates that offer excellent protection. +12 VIT, -3 DEX
Plate Armor.flavor: For those who believe that the best defense is a good offense... or just really good defense.

Novice Robe.name: Novice Robe
Novice Robe.description: Simple cloth robes worn by magic students. +2 INT
Novice Robe.flavor: The traditional garb of magic apprentices. Comfortable and imbued with minor protective spells.

Master Robe.name: Master Robe
Master Robe.description: Finely woven robes that enhance magical abilities. +8 INT, +2 VIT
Master Robe.flavor: Worn by masters of the arcane arts. These robes seem to shimmer with inner power.

Gold Ring.name: Gold Ring
Gold Ring.description: A simple but elegant gold band. +2 LUCK
Gold Ring.flavor: Sometimes the simplest accessories bring the most fortune. This ring seems to catch the light just right.

Ring of Power.name: Ring of Power
Ring of Power.description: A legendary artifact that enhances all abilities. +2 All Stats
Ring of Power.flavor: One ring to rule them all. This artifact pulses with ancient power and wisdom.

Ring of the Giant.name: Ring of the Giant
Ring of the Giant.description: A massive ring that enhances physical strength. +5 STR
Ring of the Giant.flavor: Said to have been worn by giants in ancient times. It makes the wearer feel... larger than life.

Ring of Intellect.name: Ring of Intellect
Ring of Intellect.description: A ring that sharpens the mind and enhances magical abilities. +5 INT
Ring of Intellect.flavor: Knowledge is power, and this ring amplifies both. Your thoughts become clearer, your magic stronger.

Ring of Vitality.name: Ring of Vitality
Ring of Vitality.description: A ring that increases endurance and physical resilience. +5 VIT
Ring of Vitality.flavor: Life flows more strongly through those who wear this ring. Wounds heal faster, fatigue comes later.

Ring of Agility.name: Ring of Agility
Ring of Agility.description: A ring that enhances speed and dexterity. +5 DEX
Ring of Agility.flavor: Movement becomes instinct, reflexes become lightning. This ring makes you untouchable.

Ring of Fortune.name: Ring of Fortune
Ring of Fortune.description: A ring that seems to bend luck in the wearer's favor. +5 LUCK
Ring of Fortune.flavor: Lady luck herself must have crafted this ring. Opportunities appear where none existed before.

Ring of Physical Might.name: Ring of Physical Might
Ring of Physical Might.description: A ring that boosts physical prowess and damage. +5 STR, +10% physical damage
Ring of Physical Might.flavor: Raw power flows through this ring. Your strikes hit harder, your presence more intimidating.

Ring of Arcane Power.name: Ring of Arcane Power
Ring of Arcane Power.description: A ring that amplifies magical output. +5 INT, +10% magic damage
Ring of Arcane Power.flavor: Arcane energy crackles around this ring. Your spells become more potent, more destructive.

Ring of Mana Flow.name: Ring of Mana Flow
Ring of Mana Flow.description: A ring that expands magical reserves. +20 max mana, +2 mana regen
Ring of Mana Flow.flavor: Mana flows like a river through this ring. Your magical well never runs dry.

Ring of Precision.name: Ring of Precision
Ring of Precision.description: A ring that sharpens strikes and reflexes. +5% crit chance, +3 DEX
Ring of Precision.flavor: Precision is power. This ring makes every strike count, every movement perfect.

Ring of the Warrior Mage.name: Ring of the Warrior Mage
Ring of the Warrior Mage.description: A ring for those who walk between worlds of martial and magical power. +3 STR, +3 INT
Ring of the Warrior Mage.flavor: The perfect balance of blade and spell. For those who master both worlds.

Ring of Eternal Defense.name: Ring of Eternal Defense
Ring of Eternal Defense.description: Ancient magic of protection. +10 Armor Rating, +3 VIT
Ring of Eternal Defense.flavor: Eternal protection against all threats. This ring has guarded heroes for centuries.

Ring of Mystic Knowledge.name: Ring of Mystic Knowledge
Ring of Mystic Knowledge.description: A ring that channels arcane energy and protects against magic. +10 Magic Resistance, +4 INT
Ring of Mystic Knowledge.flavor: Knowledge is the greatest defense. This ring protects both body and mind from mystical threats.
